movies.title: Memories
movies.plot: "Memories" is made up of three separate science-fiction stories. In the first, "Magnetic Rose," four space travelers are drawn into an abandoned spaceship that contains a world created by one woman's memories. In "Stink Bomb," a young lab assistant accidentally transforms himself into a human biological weapon set on a direct course for Tôkyô. The final episode, "Cannon Fodder," depicts a day in the life of a city whose entire purpose is the firing of cannons at an unseen enemy.
movies.simplePlot: "Memories" is made up of three separate science-fiction stories. In the first, "Magnetic Rose," four space travelers are drawn into an abandoned spaceship that contains a world created by ...

biography.bio: Shigeru Chiba was born on February 4, 1954 in Kumamoto, Japan as Masaharu Maeda. He is known for his work on My Neighbor Totoro (1988), Lamu (1981) and Fist of the North Star (1984).
biography.name: Shigeru Chiba

biography.bio: Hisao Egawa was born on September 13, 1962 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Naruto the Last: Le film (2014) and Engine Squadron Go-onger (2008).
biography.name: Hisao Egawa

biography.bio: Kayoko Fujii is an actress, known for Akira (1988), Romeo's Blue Skies (1995) and One Missed Call (2003).
biography.name: Kayoko Fujii

biography.bio: Nobuaki Fukuda was born on December 18, 1950 in Nagasaki, Japan. He is an actor, known for Silence (2016), Naruto Shippûden: The Lost Tower (2010) and Naruto: Shippûden (2007).
biography.name: Nobuaki Fukuda

biography.bio: Ami Hasegawa is an actress, known for Memories (1995), Magnetic Rose (1995) and Chouriki Sentai Ohranger (1995).
biography.name: Ami Hasegawa

biography.bio: Isamu Hayashi is an actor, known for Memories (1995) and Soulcalibur Legends (2007).
biography.name: Isamu Hayashi

biography.bio: Yu Hayashi was born on April 2, 1983 in Zama, Kanagawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Haikyuu!! (2014), Pom Poko (1994) and Memories (1995).
biography.name: Yu Hayashi

biography.bio: Michio Hazama is an actor, known for Anne of Green Gables (1979), Super Space Fortress Macross (1984) and Beach Red (1967).
biography.name: Michio Hazama

biography.bio: Masato Hirano is known for his work on Akira (1988), Dragon Ball Z: Cooler's Revenge (1991) and Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater (2004).
biography.name: Masato Hirano

biography.bio: Hideyuki Hori was born on March 23, 1954 in Tokyo, Japan. He is known for his work on Les chevaliers du zodiaque (1986), Perfect Blue (1997) and Demon City Shinjuku (1988).
biography.name: Hideyuki Hori

biography.bio: Hiroaki Ishikawa is an actor, known for Armitage III: Dual Matrix (2002), Memories (1995) and Mobile Suit Gundam I (1981).
biography.name: Hiroaki Ishikawa

biography.bio: Takkô Ishimori was born on January 11, 1932 in Nagasaki, Japan as Tatsuyuki Ishimori. He was an actor, known for Millennium Actress (2001), One Piece Film Z (2012) and Mobile Suit Gundam I (1981). He died on June 5, 2013 in Japan.
biography.name: Takkô Ishimori

biography.bio: Tomoko Ishimura was born on February 24, 1972 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Slayers Next (1996), Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex (2002) and Lost Universe (1998).
biography.name: Tomoko Ishimura

biography.bio: Tsutomu Isobe was born on October 13, 1950 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Cowboy Bebop: The Movie (2001), Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within (2001) and Trigun: Badlands Rumble (2010).
biography.name: Tsutomu Isobe

biography.bio: Tetsuya Iwanaga was born on June 24, 1970 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for El Hazard: The Magnificent World (1995), Evangelion: 1.0 You Are (Not) Alone (2007) and Evangelion: 2.0 You Can (Not) Advance (2009).
biography.name: Tetsuya Iwanaga
